Title: Hindi Medium
Writer: Sonu Sinha (cowriter), Saket Chaudhary, Amitosh Nagpal (dialogue by), Zeenat Lakhani
Actors: Irrfan Khan, Saba Qamar, Dishita Sehgal, Deepak Dobriyal
Plot: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.
